name: Sputnik (Lychees)
description:
*RECOMMENDED IN FULLSCREEN*

Pilot Sputnik in an alternate history where the USSR continued to develop its space probes after the end of the Space Race, in attempt to outdo the US!

A simple arcade space shooter made in 5 days for Historically Accurate Game Jam 3 with the theme of Cold War. While not exactly historically accurate, I tried to theme the game around the Cold War with some sci-fi creative liberty taken for the sake of gameplay. This was my first 3d game,  it was a great learning experience!

Asset credits:

Planet earth - headwards

Space bg - https://wwwtyro.github.io

Music/sfx - Kenney game assets

Noise - Ultra Relaxation
